expo.name: CMSAPattern
expo.description: This App is an educational App for a beginner in the sport of mounted shooting as well as a reference for advanced shooter to look up some pattern. It contains the entire pattern and description regarding the CMSA rulebook 2019-2020. All pattern are displayed in a 3-dimensional view for a better understanding of the pattern compared to black and white dots on plain paper. Another view is showing a path how to run the pattern. The path, how to run is a suggestion and is the simplest and most efficient way for a beginner. It doesn't contain any variation for now. Variations on how to run a certain pattern will be implemented in the future. On the screen how to shoot the pattern shown in a simple animation whether you engage the targets straight or cross from your horse. The bird's eye view is a different view for a better understanding of the particular pattern. The rang master view is showing the pattern similar to the rulebook on plain paper with documented distances as a 'pocket reference' to set up pattern correctly. Last but not least there is one view called >speed<, to show the beginner after he/she advances how to improve the times, where he/she can improve the speed while engaging the course - as a suggestion.
